title: Brown Harris Stevens CEO: US Needs More Housing Supply
description: Bess Freedman, Brown Harris Stevens CEO, says the U.S. needs more housing supply. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that rent control, 50-year mortgages, and restricting corporate homebuyers will not improve affordability. (Source: Bloomberg)
